rows.label: bf03290100_0010
rows.name:
War with Superbia is looking more
and more likely by the day.

rows.label: bf03290100_0020
rows.name:
Looks like they've expanded the military
program. That's a lot of warships...

rows.label: bf03290100_0030
rows.name: These ships look different to normal ships.

rows.label: bf03290100_0040
rows.name:
Yeah, we don't muck about with
our Divine Beasts much. No need for it.

rows.label: bf03290100_0050
rows.name: Invidians like things pretty natural.

rows.label: bf03290100_0060
rows.name: I've seen Invidian ships before, back in Avaritia.

rows.label: bf03290100_0070
rows.name:
It's like the total opposite of how the
Superbians use them.

rows.label: bf03290100_0080
rows.name: That could be one reason they're always at each other's throats.

rows.label: bf03290100_0090
rows.name:
They've been like cats and dogs for a long
time...

rows.label: bf03290100_0100
rows.name:
Well, from where I stand, the Superbians are
worse. All that metal's just bad taste.

rows.label: bf03290100_0110
rows.name:
It's easy to think that way, but you're not
considering how the Divine Beasts themselves feel.

rows.label: bf03290100_0120
rows.name:
Huh?
Don't all those modifications hurt?

rows.label: bf03290100_0130
rows.name:
When Divine Beasts live with humans,
that's just the way it is.

rows.label: bf03290100_0140
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: bf03290100_0150
rows.name:
I used to have a hut on my back, and a crane
stuck where the sun doesn't shine.

rows.label: bf03290100_0160
rows.name:
I never complained, not even when Rex fired up a
grill on my shoulders.

rows.label: bf03290100_0170
rows.name: Hey, you used to like that!

rows.label: bf03290100_0180
rows.name:
Mm...
Well, yes, I did like that...

rows.label: bf03290100_0190
rows.name: In fact, I miss it...

rows.label: bf03290100_0200
rows.name: If I did that now, we'd end up with roast Divine Beast!

rows.label: bf03290100_0210
rows.name: Indeed!

rows.label: bf03290100_0220
rows.name: Teeheehee!
